full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 587 Filed 01/27/22 Page 4 of 4 January 24, 2022 Page 4 Sincerely, DAVIS WRIGHT TREMAINE LLP /s/ Nathan Siegel Nathan Siegel Attorneys for American Broadcasting Companies, Inc. and NBCUniversal News Group cc: Counsel of record (via email) 4863-7911-5787v.1 0019918-000033 DOJ-OGR-00008846
